page.title: 01Cheadle Staffs
page.content: Cheadle is a small market town in the Staffordshire Moorlands.It has a population of app.10,400.In recent years several new Estates have been built & the population has increased. Local Industry(chiefly light engineering),Boltons Copper Works, Cheadle CWSO & Alton Towers provide some jobs but the town is mainly dependent on Stoke for job opportunities.The growth of the shopping centre has been restricted by the proximity to Stoke but the shops & Market(Tue.Fri.&Sat.)serve many of the needs of the town & surrounding rural area.There is traffic congestion owing to Alton Towers traffic but parking is adequate & free.The town has Parks, Play areas & Games facilities + Sports Hall,Pool & Leisure Centre. It is in close proximity to lovely countryside.
